definition[0]: to make someone a member of a group, committee etc, by the agreement of all the members
example[0]: The committee may co-opt additional members for special purposes.
example[1]: She was coopted onto the county education committee.
definition[1]: to persuade someone to help or support you
example[2]: Social scientists were co-opted to work with the development agencies.
example[3]: Nan was coopted into the kitchen to make pastry.
